Title: Relates to creating a tax credit for companies that purchase New York grown crops and use such crops in value added products
Summary: Creates a tax credit for companies that purchase New York-grown crops and use such crops in their value added products; such credit increases with increased net sales.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating a tax credit for companies that purchase New York-grown crops and use such crops in value added products
